microphone-monitor.cardDescription: Test your microphone with real-time visualization, volume metering, and recording playback.
microphone-monitor.instruction1: Click "Start Listening" to begin testing your microphone.
microphone-monitor.instruction2: Speak or make sound to see the waveform and volume levels.
microphone-monitor.instruction3: Enable "Monitor" to hear yourself through speakers (use headphones to avoid feedback).
microphone-monitor.instruction4: Use "Record" to capture audio and play it back for quality check.
microphone-monitor.instruction5: Switch between Waveform and Frequency Bars visualization modes.
microphone-monitor.monitorTooltip: Play microphone audio through speakers (use headphones to avoid feedback)
microphone-monitor.needPermission: This tool needs access to your microphone to test it. Click the button below to grant permission.
microphone-monitor.notSupported: Your browser does not support microphone access.
microphone-monitor.permissionBlocked: Microphone permission was denied. Please allow microphone access in your browser settings and reload this page.
